definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve
to do something at one go/to flow smoothly
to berate/to excoriate/to chide/also written 喝斥[he1 chi4]

sentences.english: Ah, the society is a large stage, so is human life a living play with one climax following another.
sentences.chinese: 呵，社會是一個大舞臺，人生是一出波瀾起伏的活劇。

sentences.english: There among that dusty disorder, would you care to play hide - and - seek ?
sentences.chinese: 灰塵鋪滿零亂的書齋，歌兒呵，你可願在那裏捉迷藏？

sentences.english: Ah, love, why dost thou let me wait outside at the door all alone?
sentences.chinese: 呵，愛，你爲什麼讓我獨在門外等候？

sentences.english: Oh, if there is a you, I have the patience to wait.
sentences.chinese: 呵，如果真有一個你，我是有耐心等待的。

sentences.english: A swell in the sea, Full Moon, like the heart throb of the world.
sentences.chinese: 海上有大浪，滿月呵，就象世界在心脈悸跳。

sentences.english: Hehehe, come to think of it, this is quite funny.
What a squiffy life?How can I emplace you, my prime?
sentences.chinese: 這微醉的人生呵，如何安放你我的青春？

sentences.english: But all this is very selfish, I have heard some of my townsmen say.
sentences.chinese: 可是，這一切是很自私呵，我聽到一些市民們這樣說。

sentences.english: Qiesi all day are some of the proposed non-thinking, ancient poetry in the mouth hold in mouth fragrant, ah.
sentences.chinese: 鎮日都是一些不切思議的思考，古詩在口中噙香，呵。

sentences.english: Oh, if such a photo I will not quarrel, directly to say goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 呵，要是這樣的照片我就不吵不鬧了，直接說分手了。

sentences.english: I’m on to your tricks and manipulations.
sentences.chinese: 我對你的詭計呵手段一清二楚。

sentences.english: On pours the exhausted movement the continuity two to be mad that becomes.
sentences.chinese: 應注憊動作的連貫性二氣呵成。

sentences.english: People of Orphalese, be in your pleasures like the flowers and the bees.
sentences.chinese: 阿法利斯的民衆呵，在娛樂中你們應當像花朵與蜜蜂。

sentences.english: Headmistress Huh, you are not a woman.
sentences.chinese: 校長呵，你還算不上是一個女人。
呵，是我，但我的那“一半”包括衣櫥。

sentences.english: Alaric: Heh. Could we not kill anyone tonight, please?
sentences.chinese: 呵，拜託了，我們今晚可不可以不殺人？

definition: hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
(interj. of admiration or of disgust)/to click one's tongue/to attempt to (find an opportunity to) speak
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
